cn: 需要手动重启以应用设置
en: Manual restart is required to apply the changes.
molanguage: Need hand move regamestart to use set.

cn: 屏幕空间环境光遮蔽，启用以使角落处更暗，与SDFGI一同启用时效果似乎不佳
en: Screen Space Ambient Occlusion, enable to make corners darker. Seems to work poorly with SDFGI enabled together.
molanguage: Environment light cover, let jiaoluo more black, look not gud use with SDFGI.

cn: 屏幕空间间接照明，启用SDFGI时推荐启用
en: Screen Space Indirect Lighting, recommend to enable together with SDFGI.
molanguage: Screen Space not direct ILlumination, advise use with use SDFGI

cn: 启用或许能获得更加精致的全局光照效果，调校不佳，我的电脑带不动（悲
en: Enable for better global illumination. However it usually works poorly due to my POWERLESS pc. Just I cant optimize it properlly =( .
molanguage: 编不动了，再编下去我那点可怜的英语水平怕是要更烂

cn: 使额外光源可见，以获取更精致的光照效果，会带来严重的性能消耗（真的很严重）
en: Make extra light sources visible for more decent lighting. This brings a REALLY REALLY HEAVY performance impact.
molanguage: show more lamp, more beautiful light effect, low fps.
